body.p: In this unit, we present the three main lines of experimental evidence pointing to the big bang origin of the Universe: (i) the recession of the galaxies; (ii) the microwave remnant of the early fireball; and (iii) the comparison between the calculated primordial nuclear abundances and the present-day composition of matter in the Universe.
A data sheet of useful information is provided as a pdf for your use. You may wish to print out a copy to keep handy as you progress through the unit.
